text: The best icecream in the south shore ! Their ice cream is always super fresh. I've been coming here for the past 10 years and I've tried other places but it does not compare.

Palmier Glacé is THE original crème glacée place in Brossard. It has a unique beach decor with a trippy mural depicting Miami nights. I love everything about this place.

The frozen palm is a classic ice cream shop that offers everything from parfaits to frozen yogurt (before there were these awful zombie people called vegans who started referring to it as "Froyo")

I have been going to this place since I was a kid and I still love it. It's just the best ice cream place in town.

J'y vais surtout pour leurs smoothies. Leur crème glacée est excellente, mais j'ai eu le coup de foudre pour les smoothies. Bananes/lait de coco, mangue, etc...

Je voudrais vous dire le prix, je m'en souviens jamais. Mais le rapport quantité/qualité/prix est excellent. On parle de vrais gros formats.

Le service est excellent. Je n'ai jamais été déçue.

Le décor est un peu kitsch mais je crois qu'il perdrait de son âme si le décor était changé. Bref, un incontournable

Probably the best ice cream place in Brossard and the price makes this place worth it. I went there with a promotion ticket of 2 for 1. The ice cream hasn't changed much for over 10 years ago and the place still has its old charm. 

P.S: They have a picture of Michael Jackson on his visit to Palmier glace.

17 mars 2013
Le retour du beau temps ramène l'ouverture du PALMIER GLACÉ !
Un petit bar laitier tropical situé au coin du boulevard Rome et la rue Mondor à Brossard. L'ouverture du palmier glacé rime avec le retour de la saison estivale. Lait frappé, crème galcée, tous les petits plaisirs gustatifs son de la partie.

Ça vaut un petit arrêt !

March 17th 2013
Warm weather returning, its time for the Icy Palm Tree (le Palmier Glacé) !
A little tropical themed dairy bar on the corner of Rome boulevard and Mondor street in Brossard. The annual reopening of the place goes with the return of a warm season. Milkshakes, ice cream and everything icy, tasty sweet and gooey.

It's worth a small stop !
